```ts
type _ = [
 Assert<Equal<
 keyof {a: 1, b: 2},
 'a' | 'b' // set of types
 >>,
 Assert<Equal<
 keyof {},
 never // empty set
 >>,
];

```

```ts
type KeepStrings<T> = T extends string ? T : never;
type _ = [
 Assert<Equal<
 KeepStrings<'abc'>, // normal instantiation
 'abc'
 >>,
 Assert<Equal<
 KeepStrings<123>, // normal instantiation
 never
 >>,
 Assert<Equal<
 KeepStrings<'a' | 'b' | 0 | 1>, // distributed instantiation
 'a' | 'b'
 >>,
];

```
